#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
//#define ll long long
using namespace std;
int n,c;
int ans = 0 ; 
const int MAX = 100 ; 
int arr[MAX]; 
int solve(int i,int sum)
{//int k1=0,k2=0 ;
    if(i>=n)
    {
        if(sum<=c)
         ans = max(ans,sum);
    return 0 ; 
    }
    
    if(sum + arr[i] <= c)
        solve(i+1,arr[i] + sum) ;
    solve(i+1,sum);

return 0 ; 
}
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t ;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	    scanf("%d %d",&n,&c);
	    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	        scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
	    ans = 0 ; 
	    solve(0,0);
	    cout<<(c-ans)<<endl; 
	  //  cout<<( c - solve(0,0) )<<endl ; 
	}
	return 0;
}
